item.title: Braces in Python
item.description: One of the hidden features of python I discovered today is that if you don’t like whitespace, you can use the C-style {} by issuing: > > > from __future__ import braces This is what python replies: Â File “<stdin>”, line 1SyntaxError: not a chance :D
